oai_dc:dc.dc:title: All-trans-n-retinylidenetryptamine schiff-base in aot reverse micelles - a novel model system to study secondary interactions in rhodopsins
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SHETTY, AS
MAJUMDAR, N
ARUNA, RV
SINGH, AK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bacteriorhodopsin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The fluorescence of all-trans-N-retinylidenetryptamine (1) in AOT solubilized water pool in n-heptane is quenched by the retinyhdene unit. The results are discussed in terms of the nature of secondary interactions in rhodopsins.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: INDIAN JOURNAL OF CHEMISTRY SECTION B-ORGANIC CHEMISTRY INCLUDING MEDICINAL CHEMISTRY,32(2)208-210
